sqlMap.select:
select count(1) from BASIS.BASIS_TB_MONITOR_CACHE t
t.host_address = #hostAddress#
t.port = #port#

select t.id, t.address, t.host_address as hostAddress, t.host_name as hostName, t.port, t.delete_hits as deleteHits, t.bytes, t.total_items as totalItems, t.rusage_system as rusageSystem, t.touch_misses as touchMisses, t.cmd_touch as cmdTouch, t.listen_disabled_num as listenDisabledNum, t.auth_errors as authErrors, t.evictions, t.version, t.pointer_size as pointerSize, t.time, t.incr_hits as incrHits, t.threads, t.expired_unfetched as expiredUnfetched, t.limit_maxbytes as limitMaxbytes, t.hash_is_expanding as hashIsExpanding, t.bytes_read as bytesRead, t.curr_connections as currConnections, t.get_misses as getMisses, t.reclaimed, t.bytes_written as bytesWritten, t.hash_power_level as hashPowerLevel, t.connection_structures as connectionStructures, t.cas_hits as casHits, t.delete_misses as deleteMisses, t.total_connections as totalConnections, t.rusage_user as rusageUser, t.cmd_flush as cmdFlush, t.libevent, t.uptime, t.reserved_fds as reservedFds, t.touch_hits as touchHits, t.cas_badval as casBadval, t.pid, t.get_hits as getHits, t.curr_items as currItems, t.cas_misses as casMisses, t.accepting_conns as acceptingConns, t.evicted_unfetched as evictedUnfetched, t.cmd_get as cmdGet, t.cmd_set as cmdSet, t.auth_cmds as authCmds, t.incr_misses as incrMisses, t.hash_bytes as hashBytes, t.decr_misses as decrMisses, t.decr_hits as decrHits, t.conn_yields as connYields, t.create_date as createDate from BASIS.BASIS_TB_MONITOR_CACHE t
t.host_address = #hostAddress#
t.port = #port#
sqlMap.insert:
select BASIS.BASIS_SEQ_MONITOR_CACHE.nextval from dual
insert into BASIS.BASIS_TB_MONITOR_CACHE (ID, ADDRESS, HOST_ADDRESS, HOST_NAME, PORT, DELETE_HITS, BYTES, TOTAL_ITEMS, RUSAGE_SYSTEM, TOUCH_MISSES, CMD_TOUCH, LISTEN_DISABLED_NUM, AUTH_ERRORS, EVICTIONS, VERSION, POINTER_SIZE, TIME, INCR_HITS, THREADS, EXPIRED_UNFETCHED, LIMIT_MAXBYTES, HASH_IS_EXPANDING, BYTES_READ, CURR_CONNECTIONS, GET_MISSES, RECLAIMED, BYTES_WRITTEN, HASH_POWER_LEVEL, CONNECTION_STRUCTURES, CAS_HITS, DELETE_MISSES, TOTAL_CONNECTIONS, RUSAGE_USER, CMD_FLUSH, LIBEVENT, UPTIME, RESERVED_FDS, CAS_BADVAL, PID, GET_HITS, CURR_ITEMS, CAS_MISSES, ACCEPTING_CONNS, EVICTED_UNFETCHED, CMD_GET, CMD_SET, AUTH_CMDS, INCR_MISSES, HASH_BYTES, DECR_MISSES, DECR_HITS, CONN_YIELDS, TOUCH_HITS, CREATE_DATE) values (#id:VARCHAR#, #address:VARCHAR#, #hostAddress:VARCHAR#, #hostName:VARCHAR#, #port:VARCHAR#, #deleteHits:VARCHAR#, #bytes:VARCHAR#, #totalItems:VARCHAR#, #rusageSystem:VARCHAR#, #touchMisses:VARCHAR#, #cmdTouch:VARCHAR#, #listenDisabledNum:VARCHAR#, #authErrors:VARCHAR#, #evictions:VARCHAR#, #version:VARCHAR#, #pointerSize:VARCHAR#, #time:VARCHAR#, #incrHits:VARCHAR#, #threads:VARCHAR#, #expiredUnfetched:VARCHAR#, #limitMaxbytes:VARCHAR#, #hashIsExpanding:VARCHAR#, #bytesRead:VARCHAR#, #currConnections:VARCHAR#, #getMisses:VARCHAR#, #reclaimed:VARCHAR#, #bytesWritten:VARCHAR#, #hashPowerLevel:VARCHAR#, #connectionStructures:VARCHAR#, #casHits:VARCHAR#, #deleteMisses:VARCHAR#, #totalConnections:VARCHAR#, #rusageUser:VARCHAR#, #cmdFlush:VARCHAR#, #libevent:VARCHAR#, #uptime:VARCHAR#, #reservedFds:VARCHAR#, #casBadval:VARCHAR#, #pid:VARCHAR#, #getHits:VARCHAR#, #currItems:VARCHAR#, #casMisses:VARCHAR#, #acceptingConns:VARCHAR#, #evictedUnfetched:VARCHAR#, #cmdGet:VARCHAR#, #cmdSet:VARCHAR#, #authCmds:VARCHAR#, #incrMisses:VARCHAR#, #hashBytes:VARCHAR#, #decrMisses:VARCHAR#, #decrHits:VARCHAR#, #connYields:VARCHAR#, #touchHits:VARCHAR#, sysdate)
